= Fugitive =

| Command      | Description                                         |
|--------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| `:Gstatus`   | output of `git status`                              |
| `:Gcommit %` | commit the current file, editing the commit message |
| `:Git`       | run an arbitrary git command                        |
| `Git!`       | open the output of a command in a temp file         |
